column5: If you take a case of non alcoholic beer across the border does it count the same as beer with alcohol in it or would it be like pop? Otts
You of all people asking about non-alcohol beer. Have a good trip and greet "the boss".
[font color=green size=3][b]The question is always "How much alchol do you have?" Not do you have any NA beer. Wish'in I was fish'in on Wabby

Otts In 1992 I had just quit drinking. I took some NA beer across into Saskatchewan. The border quard thought I was pulling his leg. It didn't matter so I just declared it as beer. Reminded me of a joke I heard about that time. A man walks into a bar and says "I'd like a non alcholic beer please." The bartender looks at him and says "Why?" Good luck Larry
